Package fr.univartois.cril.approximation.solver.state

Class SubApproximationStateSolver

java.lang.Object
fr.univartois.cril.approximation.solver.state.AbstractState
fr.univartois.cril.approximation.solver.state.SubApproximationStateSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISolverState
public class SubApproximationStateSolver extends AbstractState
The SubApproximationStateSolver represents the state of the solver when performing a search on a relaxed problem.
